Activision announces the play of the 4 Fantastic for Xbox, Pc, Ps2 and Gc.  Mr.  Fantastic, Torch, Invisible Girl, The Thing, these are the protagonists of the play of the movie of the 4 Fantastic, super acquaintances heroes of Marvel.  The 4 Fantastic is a play of action in third person.  The challenge of the play is to manage to dominate the super powers of our team to be able to carry out destructive super attacks combined, for save the human race of the disaster of the villainous Doctor Death.  In the play will be able to revive the experience of the movie and to go but there in the history, with new destinies and new exclusive history for the play.  It utilizes any of the heroes of the 4 Fantastic by separated or together at the same time, changing of hero when desire you.  Mr.  Fantastic it uses its ability to be stretched to attack from a distance or to pass among the grilles of a jail, Invisible Girl moves as a ninja behind its enemies, unlike Torch balls of fire or creates walls of fire to be protected of its enemies, The Thing utilizes its rough force for put an end to everything that be put in front.  It shares the experience of play with friends thanks to its way of play shared or fights the one against the other in multiple settings.  The history this written by the Zak Penn the writer of the movie X-Men 2.
